question: By which of the following methods the age of tree can be estimated?
option1: Counting the number of concentric rings
option2: Counting the nodes and internodes of the trunk
option3: Measuring the girth of the tree trunk
answer: Counting the number of concentric rings
explanation: Most accurate way to estimate tree age is to count the annual rings of wood growth. Each ring marks a complete cycle of seasons, or one year, in the tree\'s life.
